subject: Simsonn Plus Pedals
description_text:
Hello!

I am having trouble with the pedals I received. Sometimes they just
disconnect which has impacted a race before (Braking zone, I brake and they
disconnected for a slight second.)

I have installed the firmware fully onto the pedals, I made sure the pedals
are plugged into a Blue USB 3.0 port on my motherboard. I don't know what
else to do. Any assistance would be greatly appreciated.

Thanks!

Wayne English

conversations.body_text: Hi Stealthy Cifer,   If this happens, it indicates that the computerâ€™s grounding is not reliable, possibly because a three-prong plug was not used with a three-prong wall outlet. You can refer to the post below: connect the computer case to the stand, and connect the control box to the metal screws on the pedals. This should resolve the disconnection issue.          https://github.com/SHWotever/SimHub/wiki/USB-Issues-Troubleshooting https://support.gomezsimindustries.com/portal/en/kb/articles/understanding-emi-and-grounding
